title: Unable to connect hear-phones to Pixel 2 XL
content:
Unable to connect to hear-phone to Pixel 2 XL with neither normal hear-phones nor Google USB-C Earbuds. I tried restarting the device after connecting, restarting in safe mode everything, but nothing is helpful. Well I am getting notification "USB controlled by" immediately after connecting, But I am not able to change the device(PFA). 
Android version: 9
Android security path level: Feb 5, 2019

Thanks in advance,
Seshu.
